mapper.select: select og.order_no orderNo, og.people people, to_char(og.order_date, 'mm/dd hh24:mi') orderDate, og.delivery_m_adr deliveryMAdr, og.delivery_s_adr deliverySAdr, biz.min_price minPrice, cp.countPeople, cp.finalPay, cp.pFee from order_group og, delivery de, business biz, (select order_no, p_fee as pFee, count(p_order_no) as countPeople, sum(final_pay) as finalPay from personal_order group by order_no, p_fee ) cp where biz.store_no = og.store_no and cp.order_no = og.order_no and cp.countpeople <> og.people and og.store_no = #{storeNo} order by order_date desc

select po.p_order_no pOrderNo, po.order_no, po.attendVfy attendVfy, po.no, og.store_no from personal_order po, order_group og where po.order_no = og.order_no and po.order_no = #{orderNo} and po.no = #{no}
